column2: Introducing VERSO templates to start building interactive stories
column4: You can see the templates live at https://vcsi.cmplxsys.w3.uvm.edu/scrolly-story-1/. The code lives in the following Github repository: https://github.com/Vermont-Complex-Systems/website-template. Vermont Research Open Source Program Office (VERSO) at UVM main website: https://verso.w3.uvm.edu/. Our main website showcasing the science we do at the Vermont Complex Systems Institute: https://complexstories.uvm.edu/. P.S. The amazing story we showcase at first is by Nadieh Bremer: https://endfund.org/visualizing-neglect/.
column5: Introducing VERSO templates to start building interactive stories
